message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $950,000 for it.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I agree your product is valuable, I find the price a bit high. I'd be willing to purchase it for $750,000.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. To move forward, I would like to propose a price of $850,000 for the product.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  I can move my price up to $800,000, but that's  as high as I can go.
Considering our previous discussions, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $825,000 for the product.
Alice, it seems we are getting closer.  I'll increase my offer to $810,000 hoping we can close the deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. In light of this, I am prepared to offer the product at $820,000.
